category.motivation: The article describes Amazon’s Labor Day sale, a company promotional event, which falls under company_update.

article_node.title: Looking for Labor Day tool deals? Here's how you can save.
article_node.summary: Amazon’s Labor Day sale, starting August 22 and running through September 1, offers deep discounts—over 50% off on power tools, home improvement items, and electronics. Prime members gain early access to deals and free shipping, while discounted Prime memberships are available for young adults and government‑assisted customers. The promotion includes up to 81% off on select products and highlights key categories such as tools, mattresses, and appliances.
